tr.td: Change of possession, WES ball on WES35, 1st and 10.
I. Fuchs kickoff 50 yards to the HAM15, J. Hopsicker return 19 yards to the HAM34 (J. Sanchez; I. Fuchs).
PENALTY WES OFF 9 yards to the HAM43.
